article:
Very few people like _ chores around the house. However, we all know that people must do them. Kids living _ Washington  have chores to do to help their family every day. The chores _ different for different kids. Parents often teach _ what to do and how to do the chores.
 _ is good for parents to teach their children to do chores at an early age. Many parents think chores are important _ children--even very young ones. Doing chores teaches children many important skills. Chores also teach children about fairness and commitment . Children can learn many skills and values  _ doing chores .
